title: Inception
description: A thief who enters the dreams of others

title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years

title: The Dark Knight
description: A vigilante known as Batman sets out to dismantle crime

title: Pulp Fiction
description: Various interconnected stories of crime in Los Angeles

title: Forrest Gump
description: A man with a low IQ witnesses historical events and unwittingly influences them

title: The Matrix
description: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of his reality

title: The Godfather
description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son

title: Titanic
description: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic

title: Inglourious Basterds
description: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
description: A young hobbit, Frodo Baggins, who has found the One Ring that belongs to the Dark Lord Sauron, begins his journey to Mount Doom in order to destroy the ring
